feedbacks.title: Speakers Too Quiet
feedbacks.description: The sound from the speakers was too low for the audience to hear clearly at the back.

images.description: View of the event from the back.

feedbacks.actionTaken: Volume was increased midway through the event.

feedbacks.title: Perfect Sound Quality
feedbacks.description: The sound system worked flawlessly throughout the event. Excellent clarity and volume.

feedbacks.title: Distorted Bass
feedbacks.description: There was noticeable distortion in the bass frequencies, especially during the DJ set.

images.description: Audio equipment during the DJ set.

feedbacks.actionTaken: Bass EQ was adjusted after complaints.

feedbacks.title: No Issues, Great Service
feedbacks.description: The entire setup was done perfectly. No sound issues and everything was on time.

images.description: View of the sound setup at the event.

feedbacks.title: Mic Cutting Out
feedbacks.description: The microphone kept cutting out during the speeches, which caused interruptions.
feedbacks.actionTaken: Backup microphone was used to resolve the issue.
